meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with edible young shoots.
meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested fresh asparagus from his garden.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating roasted asparagus with my dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to hide in the tall asparagus patch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like the tender asparagus shoots in spring.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the asparagus brightened up the plate.

meanings.definition: The young shoots of this plant used as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: Asparagus is a nutritious addition to any meal.
meanings.sent2: She sautéed the asparagus in olive oil and garlic.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully juggled the asparagus before cooking it.
meanings.sent4: His ideas sprouted like the fresh asparagus shoots in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of grilled asparagus filled the kitchen with delight.
